title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 410.6 - Records for reimbursement of expenses
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 410.6 - Records for reimbursement of expenses

State Regulations

Counties shall keep and maintain complete books and records
concerning any and all expenses for which the county seeks reimbursement
pursuant to this Part. Such books and records shall be kept available for
examination by authorized personnel of the Department of Corrections and

Community Supervision and the Office of the State Comptroller at all reasonable
times at the county offices for six years from the date of payment. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7

410.6

Amended

New

York State Register August 16, 2017/Volume XXXIX, Issue 33, eff. 8/16/2017

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
